Apple Pie and Enchiladas
By: gaelicchick
Dark forces and flying drumsticks, talking birds, talking mirrors, bigotry, love, and a quest to save the last remnant of a vanishing people. Fifth year, Sirius and Remus cameos and a tiny hint of R/Hermione*FINAL CHAPTER*
